description: This green veggie soup is warming, packed with nutrients and smooth and silky with cannellini beans blended in.
name: Green Veggie Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 head broccoli, florets chopped, stalk grated
2L vegetable stock, hot, made with reduced salt stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan on a medium high heat. Add the leeks, garlic, zucchini, fennel, grated broccoli stalk and celery and cook for 10 minutes to soften, stirring occasionally.

Increase the heat and stir in the cannellini beans. Pour over the stock and bring the boil. Cook for 5 minutes, reduce the heat and add the broccoli florets, parsley and spinach. Cook for 5 minutes to soften the broccoli.
Remove the pan from the heat and using a handheld blender, blitz well for 2-3 minutes until you have a smooth soup with no lumps. Add lemon juice to taste, season with cracked black pepper and serve.
Add lemon juice to taste, season with cracked black pepper and serve.
